title: Native by Urban Company M2 RO Water Purifier | No Service for 2 Years | 2-year Unconditional Warranty | Smart iOT-enabled Monitoring | RO+UV+Copper+Alkaline | 8L Storage | 4-in-1 Health Booster
description:
About this item    No Service for 2 Years: Advanced multi-micron filtration and self-cleaning technology means filters last a full 2 years without any maintenance, AMC or service calls. Save up to ‚Çπ20,000 on service costs over 8 years.    2-Year Unconditional Warranty: All filters, membranes & electrical parts covered. No conditions on water quality or usage.    Smart Real-Time Monitoring: Track your water quality, filter health, and consumption in real-time through the Urban Company app. Full visibility into your purifier's performance, with proactive alerts when service is needed.    10-Stage Purifier: Complete purification with RO + UV + Alkaline + Copper. FDA and ISI certified, delivering 99.99% pure water enriched with essential minerals.    Science-Backed Purity, No Half Measures: Even low TDS water can hide metals and plastics. We eliminate all risks with 100% RO processing, then restore essential minerals. No MTDS mixing, no RO bypassing either.    Free Installation by Urban Company: Professional installation at your preferred date and time. Additional pressure equipment may be required for certain installations (‚Çπ250-750)    8-Litre Storage: Perfect capacity for a family of 4. The food-grade tank keeps water mineral-enriched and safe for consumption.    
   Works with All Water Sources: Tanker, borewell, municipal and tap water - universal compatibility for any home Box Contents: Water Purifier, Pre-filter, installation kit, digital user manual & warranty card   Show More   ¬õ  See more product details
features: No Service for 2 Years: Advanced multi-micron filtration and self-cleaning technology means filters last a full 2 years without any maintenance, AMC or service calls. Save up to ‚Çπ20,000 on service costs over 8 years.
2-Year Unconditional Warranty: All filters, membranes & electrical parts covered. No conditions on water quality or usage.

Smart Real-Time Monitoring: Track your water quality, filter health, and consumption in real-time through the Urban Company app. Full visibility into your purifier's performance, with proactive alerts when service is needed.
10-Stage Purifier: Complete purification with RO + UV + Alkaline + Copper. FDA and ISI certified, delivering 99.99% pure water enriched with essential minerals.

Science-Backed Purity, No Half Measures: Even low TDS water can hide metals and plastics. We eliminate all risks with 100% RO processing, then restore essential minerals. No MTDS mixing, no RO bypassing either.
Free Installation by Urban Company: Professional installation at your preferred date and time. Additional pressure equipment may be required for certain installations (‚Çπ250-750)
8-Litre Storage: Perfect capacity for a family of 4. The food-grade tank keeps water mineral-enriched and safe for consumption.
Works with All Water Sources: Tanker, borewell, municipal and tap water - universal compatibility for any home
Box Contents: Water Purifier, Pre-filter, installation kit, digital user manual & warranty card

reviews.title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Native UC: Reliable, Affordable & Efficient
reviews.text:
I recently purchased the Native UC water filter and I must say it is truly value for money. The brand provides excellent service with timely installation and support, which makes the overall experience very smooth and hassle-free.In terms of performance, the noise level is significantly lower compared to other brands, which really adds to the comfort of daily usage. The filtration quality is also up to the mark, delivering clean drinking water consistently.Overall, I am very satisfied with both the product performance and the service quality. If you are looking for a reliable water filter that combines affordability, efficiency, and professional service, Native UC is definitely a great choice.

reviews.text:
I'm thoroughly impressed with this water purifier! The delivery was lightning-fast, and the installation happened on the same day, which was super convenient. The technical person who came for installation was knowledgeable, friendly, and did a great job. But the real test was the water quality, and I'm happy to report that it's absolutely fantastic! Best Purifier with best service and best filters.
reviews.text:
Filters ka quality bahut mast hai, service providers bhi inka khud ka hai, purifier ka design awesome hai, paani ka taste ar tds ekdm perfect hai maine khud tds check Kiya hai 100-105 after purification and before purification tds 350 tha installation service bhi bahut acha provide krti hai company, aankh band krke lelo bhai, sbse kam paisa lgega iske filter replacement me bhi baaki purifiers se compare kare to, baaki k purifiers mei har saal 5000 ka filter replacement cost aata hai, lekin isme har 2 saal p sirf 4500 ar wo bhi saare filters ko replace krti hai company.
